content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Duisburg, remember our conversation here is focused solely on the rental price as given by the scenario rules. Let's begin negotiating the price for this prime location in the city center. I originally had high expectations, so let's see if we can reach an agreement beneficial to both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Starting with a reasonable offer, I propose the rental price to be 650 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I hesitate to accept your initial offer so quickly but will consider it. My aim is to maximize the revenue from this property. However, for now, I agree to the price of 675 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your flexibility. While 675 Euros per month sounds like a fair compromise to me as well, I must carefully assess my budget. I don't want to continue the negotiation solely based on this small difference, but I'll keep it in mind. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
